error.multipleFilesErrorTitle: Cannot upload multiple files at once
error.multipleFilesErrorMessage: Please add each file one at a time.
error.shapefileErrorTitle: Shapefile must be contained in a ZIP file.
error.shapefileErrorMessage: Please zip all files including .shp, .shx, .dbf, and .prj and try again.
error.unsupportedFileTypeTitle: This file type is not supported.
error.unsupportedFileTypeMessage: Learn more about supported file types
